name: Publish Date DatePicker
author: Vinod Dalvi

sections.description:
Publish Date DatePicker adds interactive calendar in publish section of post, page & custom post.

It makes adding and changing date easier by selecting it from interactive calendar using mouse.

Like Add Search To Menu? Give us a rating

Need Help or Have Suggestions? contact us on Plugin support forum
sections.installation:
• Install the plugin from the ‘Plugins’ section in your dashboard (Go to Plugins > Add New > Search and search for Publish Date DatePicker).
  • Alternatively, you can download the plugin from the repository. Unzip it and upload it to the plugins folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation).
  • Activate it through the ‘Plugins’ section.
sections.faq:
Does it cause to make site slow?

No. It only loads tiny css,image and js file in edit screen of post, page and custom post.
sections.changelog:

  • Removed – Reference to freewptp

2.2

  • Improved functionality of plugin reset button.

2.0.1

  • Added hooks to control inclusion of plugin CSS and JS files.
  • Added CSS to resolve the conflict issue.

2.0.0

  • Added TimePicker support.

1.1.0

  • Developed functionality to always display DatePicker.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
